description:
Comfy pants for hanging out. When spending hours in a harness light and stretchy pants are a must. The Summit Off Width pants were designed for multipitch days and look great with a little chalk dust. Ergonomic pattering and a stretchy recycled nylon let you move freely.

  • Light recycled nylon blend has an easy 4-way stretch
  • PFC-free DWR finish helps keep you dry during unexpected showers and keeps them looking cleaner longer
  • Elastic encased waistband and integrated belt let you customize the fit
  • Dual hand pockets and zippered back pockets keep essentials close and secure
  • Crotch gusset and articulated knees let these pants stretch and move with you
  • Slim athletic fit does away with billowing and bunching
name: The North Face Summit Off Width Pant - Women's
